pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Estimation for Finite Mixture of Distributions // Provides statistical tools for Bayesian estimation for finite mixture of distributions, mainly mixture of Gamma, Normal and t-distributions. The package is implemented the recent improvements in Bayesian literature for the finite mixture of distributions, including Mohammadi and et al. (2013) https://doi:10.1007/s00180-012-0323-3 and Mohammadi and Salehi- Rad (2012) https://doi:10.1080/03610918.2011.588358.
